   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Support
========

Thank you for using AIZero AI Services. We believe that there is a way for everyone to use AI easily. If you need help and support, please contact our support email at support@aizero.org.

1. Information Required
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

To facilite the best experience, please provide the following information should you require suppport: 1) the original API calls details with URL, header, body. 2). the response calls including return codes, and text or message.
